content.detailedDescription:
Orchard park ny
nov 11 2010 3pm 6min

this sighting begins with my boss walking in the room and telling me to take a look at this object out the window above the trees. doing so i seen what looked like at first, a escaped birthday balloon. but seconds later it looked very different so i took out the trusty cam and got some shots....Wow! i had these pictures for about 2 weeks before i got to looking at them.
the object seems to go from solid to light/energy form,very interesting! 

all images are taken one after the other.Mufon only will allow 3 pics there are 5 total!

i will be uploading pic 1,2,and 5 

e-mail contact: *(wit's email deleted--cms/sg)

let me know what you think everyone!
content.summary: Matalic/light/energy shape shifting object in orchard park ny

content.detailedDescription: Outside on deck smoking cigar. looking east i see a red-orange object flying in a straight line level with ground at a low attitute at about 75-80 degrees above the horizon.  moving very fast, to the west,  i saw it maybe for 1-2 seconds before it disappeared behind neighbors house.  the object looked like a fire log with no flames, just glowing red hot.  thought it was a meteor at first, but just didn't look like one after i thought about it.
content.summary: Racing across the sky, fastest thing i ever seen. red-orange object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a security guard patrolling the sunrise lakes (phase one) residential complex in my patrol car. i noticed, out my left side window, a luminiscent green sphere about 100 feet high, drifting slowly and quietly from north to south. i jumped out of the car, never taking my eyes off of it, to get a better look. it seemed to take notice of my attention and sped up directly to the south on a straight line at an incredible speed, and faded out of sight. the entire incident lasted about 10 or 15 seconds.

coincidently, or not, that day was my first official paranormal investigation of the biltmore hotel in coral gables, with a partner. very strange.

also, when i got out of the car to get a better look, i "felt" that it noticed me.
content.summary: Luminiscent " traffic light green " sphere

content.detailedDescription: The time was about 10:00 pm in mid august 1977. two friends and myself were parked on the eastern slope of a mountain west of yreka, ca. we were standing outside the car talking. the sky was clear and the moon was not up yet. we were watching a small airplane flying due east. i estimate the airplanes altitude to be about 10,000-12,000 feet. we were at roughly 4000 feet in elevation. that airplane had come over the mountain and had been in view for about 90 seconds. following the same path as the plane there appeared a sphere of pure white extremely bright light. it came over the mountain and covered roughly 3 miles in about 1/2 a second. it stopped or more accurately slowed to match the speed of the plane instantly a short distance behind it. the sphere appeared to be roughly about the same size as the airplane or maybe a little larger. we all watched in pure amazement as the sphere followed the airplane for the next few minutes over the horizon and out of view. this thing went from a few thousand miles an hour to about a hundred miles an hour in an instant. all i could think about was that the pilot had no idea what was happening as there are no rear view mirrors in airplanes. many years later i told this story to a friend who said he saw the same event from about 5 miles further to the east.
content.summary: Bright sphere traveling lighting fast stops instantly

content.detailedDescription:
Im sorry for the letter in spanish-

no es la primera vez que observo bolas de luz en el trayecto de la autopista la plata-buenos aires. la primera vez quedo suspendida en el aire sobre el rio de la plata, girando sobre si misma y emitiendo luices brillantes de todos colores, y rapidamente desapareci; la segunda vez siguio junto a mi auto a aproximadamente 200 metros y por varios cientos de metros y desaparecio. en esta ultima vez aparecio algo similar  en direccion oeste-este hacia el rio de la plata, cruzando por encima la autopista la plata-buenos aires: totalmente silenciosa,brillante y esferica; no es ruta de aeronaves civiles ni comerciales y m���s a la altura que se presento ,ignoro cual sea pero estimo en 200 a 300 metros),en esta ooportinidad pude
documentar el evento con mi celular mientras manejaba.
adjunto imagenes-
agradecerian me informen si les fue de utilidad.
gracias.
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Fireball crossing road

content.detailedDescription:
It was the year 1976 and i had driven across the usa from washington dc with 3 other friends to los angeles, california. shortly after we had arrived in late march of 1976, we drove down to the beach city of venice by the ocean just south of santa monica to drop one friend off for a radio interview at a local radio station somewhere between 7:30 and 8pm. as i parked to let my friend out,..My car was facing north toward the santa monica pier with all it's colorful rides and the pacific ocean was directly on my left, the driver's side.

as my friend got out of the car, i happened to look out my window to the left  (the window was rolled down) and commented to the others how clear the california sky looked with all the stars glistening when suddenly, among those stars, there appeared to be quite a large, moving object which immediately gave clear indications by the nature of it's movement that this was not just an ordinary flying object, but one with "extreme" maneuvering abilities to move either quickly right to left and then back and forth very quickly in a controlled and "darting" fashion. it had several bright and glistening blue-green lights and was shaped like an oval, sphere-like object. because the western sky was so clear that night, this object was easy to view, although it was very high in the sky approximately at a 60 to 75 degree angle up from the ground where i was in my car and out over the pacific ocean just off the venice california coastline.

i recall immediately shouting to the others to please witness what i was seeing and two of the others acknowledged what i was seeing. we watched as it did it's unearthlike maneuvers in the sky (all done in a relatively short and very local space in the sky) for just a few moments more. it all took place in less than 3 minutes and then,...Suddenly, just after it stood still hovering in one place, it tore off faster than anything imaginable darting like a comet's tail to the south of where we were and disappearing clean out of sight. just imagine an object travelling from right to left in the sky in less than a fraction of a second. nothing known to mankind moves that fast. 

in contrast to this vessel were two other planes in the sky....One a jet and the other a small local plane. the speed that this object travelled was so fast in contrast to the jet in the sky that it made the jet appear to move like a sloth.

all of us were amazed to have witnessed this unusual event and, i might add,...None of us were drinking, stoned or in any way other than totally straight. we are all college grads and at the time 28 years of age having just arrived in california. to this day, (i'm 62 yrs old now) i remember the event like it was yesterday because it was witnessed in a short time, in incredibly clear skies and i was of a totally clear mind. it was a clean and bright vessel and it travelled at enormously fast speeds and could stop on a dime and simply hover back and forth.

all i knew was that we/i had just witnessed something never before seen by my human eyes and that nothing could have ever moved that fast from a standing position. hey ...This was not just another day on the planet earth. i've seen nothing even close to this amazing incident/sighting since then....But i will always have this to compare things to in the event it ever happens again.
content.summary: Spotted hovering oval shaped sphere with bright blue/green lights  high in dark sky  above the water. object  moved sideways quickly then zoomed out of sight faster than the speed of light.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was on the couch on my computer about to go to bed then i looked out my window when it flew over head from my house to the next building across from me say 20 feet away it was low enough to all most land on the roof it just bolted across and then dissapeared it just vanished i'm still looking but see nothing! it was a light blue in color very bright i knew it was not a plain or helicopter it had no flashing light it was just a solid light blue color.
content.summary: Light blue missle very bright nothing i ever seen before!

content.detailedDescription:
That's the best way to describe it.  it was a landing party that cut off traffic along interstate 40.

sounds nuts but not after you've been thru what i've been thru.  my family is from roswell nm.  my father  was born in 1904, we're from norway.  family traveled to new mexico working on the railroads.  my grandfather was killed in las vegas nm in 1916 - so my dad went to live with his aunt in roswell.  my dad would never talk about things.  i won't even go into details, it's too stupid.

he used to take me to new mexico every summer - and everytime we got near gallup or up in the nm high deserts, something fishy would happen.  so this has been going on for years - and i'm so used to it, it doesn't rattle me anymore.  

in 1987, i was down in tucson, and started seeing lights - ended up following them out into the desert - got into trouble, police had to come and get me.  then i had a lot of explaining to do - 

i keep trying to report this, and nobody takes me seriously.  they're following me around, i think it's my family problem.  whenever i get near gallup nm, and into new mexico, i have to watch out.

so in 1991, we were going on a family vacation.  there were 4 of us in the car - my husband, me, and our two kids - my daughter 14, and my son 12.   we left flagstaff late, trying to get to albuquerque.  we're driving along, and we could see lights on the road - as we got closer, it was roadbloacks, yellow flashing lights - pitch black - then we saw a road crew, only everybody was facing the other way - they were wearing yellow reflective gear with hoods - they narrowed i-40 down to 1 lane - and the freaking lane just disappeared

we experienced some dark area - a blinding flash of light - and we were back about a mile - 

i noticed that the hills on the left side of the road, we kept passing the same hills - then my son started freaking out and screaming - and my husband, who is a space cadet in the first place - he ended up having to drive us to gallup.  we checked into a local hotel - but it was weird.

we went to get a burger about 2:00 a.M. - and people were walking around at half speed, acting confused - the waiter came up and set the table wrong, and then handed us the menus upside down- 

you think sometimes that people are just stupid - but these guys were really really stupid - i played along, because i already knew something was fishy - my husband was pretty tolerant and patient- they didn't appear to know how to act

the next day got even worse - and i can describe that later - we ended up turning the car around and going back to phoenix where we lived - 

my son asked me when he was about 25, "mom, did we ever take a trip and pass the same mountain two times?"  he remembered it - we talk about it - but i don't like to upset him - so we never bring it up.  it's just something we live with.

i think they took our whole car someplace - and then brought it back, and dropped us a mile before the landing party - because when we went drove past the same mountain, the road blocks were gone, along with the lights and the guys in the reflective gear

now my husband and i sort of laugh when we see a road crew - whoever they are, they are fairly sophisticated - i think they have uniforms.  i caught some of them fixing light poles in the middle of the night too, down in tucson - when i showed up - they all ran off.  

this has to have been going on when my dad was young too.  my dad was in wwii - and had a few close encounters of his own - 

my husband said a ship landed in his yard when he was a kid living in reno - i think that they know the families of people they can trust - then they just follow you around

i saw that contrail in california - and i don't even live there. i happened to be in a deposition that day - and came outside and saw it.  

honestly, i don't think that they have any contact with the us government.  i don't think they're covering anything up, because i honestly don't think that they have any use for the government.  i get the feeling that they are just going about their business, and once in a while we see them.  i also think that the really awful things associated with ufos, are just earthbound antics.

i would have loved to been able to report this when it happened.
content.summary: Landing party

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside the walmart store waiting on my ride looking up at the stars just the starting to come up in the sky. was looking at one inpaticular thinking about how beautiful and bright it was when i realized it was moving. in a sow way it moved in a loop and then seemed to get further away and dissapear. the sky was clear that night and it hadnt quiet reached night. this suprised and excited me, unfortunatly my camera phone is slow and i was nto able to get a picture.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light color like silver or white bright like a star

content.detailedDescription: I was looking around at the scenery as i was driving to lubbock from san angelo on highway 87. i noticed a bright light white light that just appeared in the sky. it was around dusk���. so i knew it wasn���t a star; it wasn���t flashing so i knew it wasn���t a plane. it was in the sky for just a couple of seconds��� slowly became dimmer ( as if it was fading), then completely disappeared.  i looked around as i was driving to see if i could see anything in the sky, but saw nothing. the sky was clear, not even a cloud existed. i still have no logical explination as to what i saw.
content.summary: Bright light shinning

content.detailedDescription: I seen a big red blinking light in the southern sky heading home from work around 7:oopm. when i got home i sat down for about 15min. then i drove up to the convenient store when i got to the store the light was still there so i sat there for awhile and watched it. it was moving back and forth from east to west and the blinking light was changing it's blinking pattern all the time it was not consistent. i stayed there for about 10 min then went home. when i got home i grab the kids and my sister and a pair of binoculars and we went to go see it. you cant see it from my house there are too many trees. we went back on the main road and it was still there. i parked the car in a parking lot and we looked at it with the binoculars and it seemed to have many lights at least 5. it started to go north in the sky so we tried to follow it but it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Big red blinking light but when we looked through the binoculars there were at least 5 lights in a triangle pattern.

content.detailedDescription: While star gazing as i do every night, i've noticed lights moving across the sky - as bright as a star, various directions. no unusual start-stop motions, but they do seem appear from nowhere and end the same way. they seem to flicker on, then off. movement is in a straight line - but not a satellite or a plane. wanted to report because it has been happening often; 2-3 times every night for the last 3 nights.
content.summary: Lemon bay satellites?

content.detailedDescription:
December 7, 2010

event is on going. every night. stopped video recording due to camcorder being full, computer laptop is full of hours of recordings. won't erase, so i have no way of knowing if it's still going on, but presume strongly that it is.

1) i was sleeping during this occurrences, you can hear me snoring in the background. 

2) i had sat my video camera in my front window for security purposes, after an attempted break in. to my surprise i discovered when viewing the recording the next day, all of the weird lights and noises which had been caught. 

3) other than the one night of seeing numerous lights on the front end of something, i had no idea what it was because it sat so far up off the ground.

4) other than the first night i have not seen an object that some of the lights are emitting from, some of these strange lights are being emitted from a house catty corner from mine across the street.

5) for the time being i wish to remain reserved for the moment on making comment about my feelings, reactions etc. but i will report that since i became aware of these occurrences since october 23, i have lost weight, have blurred vision, suffer from periodic headaches, and extreme loss of appetite, i have experience the sensation of heat and heart palpitations which have awakened me from a sound sleep. i always sleep through the night, but rarely do now.

6) it simply disappeared.

the following is a video i came across while investigating what is happening here. though mr. [name removed/cms/tg] of sara inc.(scientific application research association) denies that their invention of acoustic waves emits any light with it, if you were to use this video as a source for a description of what i have on video, then you'll come closure to witnessing what i actually saw being pointed and directed at my truck and west side of my house on the first nights recording. though this video has other applications of weaponry, i direct you to the first demonstration.

/watch?V=qjsnozj4lvg

since your 
witness notice and election for release of contact information does not disclose who any third party identity i do not give permission for my identity or this information to be divulged, released in part of in whole to anyone outside of mufon. also since your site is set up wherein some cannot copy and paste what they have filled out on your site, i took the precaution of video taping and copying each section i did type up as well as the questions asked for my own protection and/or rights of privacy. i wish to be contacted as discussed with david mcdonald. if this is some government entity performing such actions against the public without consent or knowledge as has been perpetrated by our own government, which is ongoing abuse of the citizens of america, then do not contact me in anyway, form or fashion, as i think you've done quite enough.
content.summary: [tg] strange lights and sounds, on street and house

content.detailedDescription:
Girlfriend and i park in a corn field for a private moment. we are 19 and 20. it's late august in nj and corn is about 6 feet high. about 9:30pm. time was important because i had promised to bring her home by midnight and home was about an hour away. gorgeous night, cloudless, bright stars. visibility probably 20-25 miles. so pretty, we continue to stay in our seats and stare at the sky in front of us. within a few minutes, we (i?) notice dim light on the horizon, proceeding left to right, same speed. am guessing it was the first satellite i ever saw. we watch it slowly disappear over the horizon to the right. for some reason, we continue to watch the night sky directly in front of us, still sitting in the car, though we are 'on the clock'.

few minutes later, notice another light, brighter, starting from similar position as previous object in the far left sky (i do not know which compass direction we were facing). same path over horizon, same steady motion as first object, except this object's light is brighter. when object reaches mid-point of our field of vision, it seems to stop. we wait in silence for object to continue left to right movement. it does not continue. however, it seems to be getting brighter.

after a minute or so, i realize that the object is moving and it is becoming brighter because it is heading straight towards us. estimate the object was 4-5 miles away when girlfriend and i become agitated; not exactly frightened but upset that this thing is headed our way. looking back, it was an odd initial response.

she looks at me and says we have to leave. i start car and reverse out of the field (we were about 50 yards in) and onto road heading back to new brunswick. should be about a 10-15 minute drive to get back to route 27, out of franklin park farmland and back into town.

i accelerate to a high rate of speed (60-70?)on winding roads to get away. my girlfriend turns her passenger door mirror up to sky, and surprise, surprise, the object has arrived and stays right behind us in the center of her mirror.

now my agitation turns quickly to fear and then to anger. what am i running from? why am i running? it's probably a helicopter having some fun with us. i see a farmhouse up on the left (i'm not stopping in the middle of the road) and pull into the driveway behind an old 40s ford or chevy black pickup. there's just enough room to get off the road and behind the truck.

farmhouse is front right, truck in front of me, an 7'-8' hedgerow running the left of the driveway. i remember opening the door, placing my left foot on the ground to step out of the car, while looking up to sky above the hedgerow to where the object should be. i remember a bright light behind the hedgerow. i remember looking up to scan the sky and my memory ending at the top of the hedgerow.  

my next memory we are in the car, not talking, driving towards a t roadway stop sign (our road ends and you can either turn left or right) at which we will make a right and then be back on 27 in a 1/2 mile. as i pull up to the stop sign she says 'there they are'. i look out my window on the driver's side and see it.

it was a perfectly round, smooth saucer. surface looked like brushed stainless steel. no windows. perfectly smooth. i'm looking at the bottom of 50' - 60' saucer, about 30' over me. the bright white light was bottom center. i later remembered a red light at one edge and green at the exact opposite edge. about 10 years later i met a usaf test pilot through a mutual friend. told him about the sighting. he believed my story (a bit too easily i thought) and thought the object to be terrestrial because of the red & green lights on the aircraft. 

no sound that i can remember. no wind or breeze. it hovered over us and then slowly moved across the street (more farmland). now i can see full craft; top and bottom are identical shape and surface material. i estimate middle top to middle bottom about 20'.

i make the right and can see the traffic light on route 27 up the road. i follow along with craft (it follows us?) on our left. it has now lowered itself to just above ground, but moving with us about 40' away. my speed is normal. i'm no longer concerned about it. i lose sight of it behind a strand of trees and bushes running along the road; when we reach an opening there's no sight of it - but i have no interest in stopping to see where it went.

i pull up and stop at the traffic light on 27. it's a long light. we don't say a word until my girlfriend notices a crack in the windshield; passenger side, it's a jagged crack about 3 inches up and 4 inches over. she excitedly points out the it wasn't there at the start of the evening.

we then notice the time on the car clock is 11:22pm. as this was all happening around 9:30pm, we should been at this traffic light about an hour earlier, even with the stop - which at the time, i did not remember that i had stopped. that memory came back to me later.

clocks were unreliable on american cars in the seventies, so we confirmed the time when we got home. the car's clock was correct.

we discussed it later only once and only to confirm that we saw the craft directly over us and what it looked like.

went back once trying to find the farmhouse. i did not find it. i was never very interested in returning to the area.

later that year saw 'close encounters of the third kind'. no nightmares, no desire to head towards a meeting point and no after effects that i could point to other than a lifetime interest in ufos. 

we later broke up and i have not seen her in over 30 years. but the sighting still seems as if it happened last week.
content.summary: Ufo sighting; possible time loss; cracked windshield

content.detailedDescription:
my friend has a camera that takes a picture when it sees motion-every 5 seconds.He lives in the country.I have not taken any measurements yet.The next day his dog was sniffing the area.There is a picture of him sniffing.
my freind thinks it is a ghost.I think it is a manafactureditem.In either case it is spooky.


here are the pictures.
content.summary: My friends pictures

content.detailedDescription: I and two child hood friends "corky" and "gallagher" were camping out behind my child hood home. we were in a large wide open hay field. to the south of us about a 1/4 mile was a ridge line approximately 500 feet in elevation running east to west and separating our town (very rural) from the next; sparta twnsp. at about 10:00 p.M., all three of us noticed three separate lighted objects hovering overtop this ridge. we could not make out the shapes as it was very dark but clear that night. all three objects were far enough apart that it could not have been one object or so we thought. as we watched for roughly 5 minutes and with no sound (no sounds that night at all except peepers), the 3 objects simultaniously started to rise vertically at an easterly direction for some distance. all three stopped for a matter of a few seconds then raised higher vertically at a westerly direction. not hardly a split second later, all three in a straight line flew west at a high rate of speed and disappeared out of sight. i knew then that these were not conventional aircraft as i weekly went with my father to the local airport to fly each sunday afternoon. i have kept this to myself all these years and through my beliefs and the world wide reports coming in daily, i felt it was time to tell my story. i know to some that it may seem a little far fetched but my two friends saw them too. lastly, through my interest of the subject, what really bothers me is at that time, there was a large sheep ranch on the other side of that ridge. animal abduction going on? never thought of it; never heard of missing sheep; who knows? i hope my 2 friends may read this and verify my story. i had used their nicknames to keep them anonymous. i lost touch with both after high school in 1970. thank you mufon for giving me this opportunity.
content.summary: Three separate off-white lighted objects in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking in the sky and saw a light moving north and all of a sudden it shot west in a streak of light i saw for about a sec then it faded away
content.summary: V shaped

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were turning off of william cannon dr.Onto the frontage road to i35 headed north towards downtown austin and saw two lights hovering side by side and slowly moving down above the overpass to 290 and 35. it looked like a cars headlights in the air. we were about two miles away from it when we noticed it, it was pretty bright and it was not blinking but as we were going under the overpass it seemed the lights turned off and we lost sight. i thought it was a heli at first but saw no flashers or spotlights. my gf just kept saying "thats an f'n ufo!" and of all nights not to have the flip camera with us!!!
content.summary: Ufo over i 35 in austin tx

content.detailedDescription: I was outside looking at the stars at 6:50 pm when i saw another large, black triangle traveling southeast from over my apartment.  this one was higher up and as large as a 747!  it had dimmed lights with the same number of seven.  i will be mailing a picture of this also.  i saw a smaller one on november 2nd 2010 with my daughter that traveled directly over us and just over our apartment.  it was heading south.  i'm getting a little worried...
content.summary: Very large black triangle flies over apartment.

content.detailedDescription: I was home sleeping on the couch and a bright light out the second story foyer window caught my eye;  saw three very bright lights hovering (kite like)always seemed to face north; an additional light appeared and rotated half way around object.
content.summary: Triangle or boomerange shape atleast 3 white lights

content.detailedDescription:
...........So i got my camera,went out on the front deck of our apartment.Snapped one picture di not think i got the shot,took another.I said"it's a stealth bomber".It was a sunny day and no wind
i am not a believer in ufo's,and, or extraterrestial beings.But the bible does not state god only made earth and mankind..........Does it?
these pictures sat in my camera until today.My friend and i were driving back from pacific junction,and he asked"did you hear about the ufo siting in benson.I said "speaking of ufo's,check out these pictures i got.
he then said "we have to get to a computer and get these downloaded".
so we did and called mufon in nebraska.
you will also notice what seems to be a plane of sorts in both pictures...Just ahead of this object....Just noticed that today also.
thank you for your time on this matter.

maybe it was just this...............Baaaaaaaaaaaaaa

[advertisement removed. do not re-enter/cms/tg]
content.summary: Girlfriend said "get your camera and check this out!"

content.detailedDescription: Object was about 10000 feet up and appx 300 yrds diameter. it was heading northbound at a slow speed no sound   was evident. jt was triangle shaped flashing red ljght in the center and 2 non blinking white lights on each side .What got my attention, was the 3 rows of lights in front looked like windows. being a former p.I i noticed the extreme size of it. we have nothing that big. was movjng north toward plattsburg afb. there were other aircraft in the sky  as albany jnt airport is about 30 miles south so it was easy to campare size and distance sighting was apprx 9 mins. before it flew out of sight i took pics. but they came out to dark. this area is a hotspot as many sightings have occured over the last ten years/ thank you for your time  .
content.summary: Looked toward eastern sky saw triangle shaped object heading north

content.detailedDescription: It was a dark, cold night in alaska.I had just trapped my last otter for dinner. i was outside roasting it when a large egg-cigar shaped object came low to the surface, i thought it was a phoenix.My small chihuahua, beast, barked wildly as it came towards us. i grabbed my otter and walked slowly toward the object. as i got closer a bright light shown upon me and next thing i know i am inside it. these beautiful purple women with long sparkly antenni touched my stomach. then an owl flew above the women and stared deep into my soul. this owl reminded me of the one i had as a pet when i attended hogwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry. i tried to cast a spell on the woman but they used a counter spell and it rebounded. then i realized wait.. i cant do spells.. harry potter is not real. the women decided to impregnate me. they did it using invetro fertilization. then i died. i woke up in a field in kentucky in 1941. they took my otter.
content.summary: They took me with them and dropped me in a cornfield in kentucky.

content.detailedDescription: As i was getting ready to park at work in decorah iowa, i notice a very bright piercing white light up in the sky. i probably wouldn't have noticed it normally, but it was the only light in the sky since it was completely overcast and still dark outside. i couldn't tell how high up it was, but it wasn't low at all. it had to be at least a half mile up or higher. i had a hard time at first thinking it was not a star, but the cloud coverage was thick, and it was far brighter than a star would be even when there would be no cloud cover. i stayed outside for approximately 10-15 minutes until i went into work because i was going to be late. during the whole 15 minutes the light never moved, changed shade or colors at all.
content.summary: Bright light hovering in sky unmoving during complete cloud coverage

content.detailedDescription:
The first sighting was on tuesday evening, november 30th.
at just before 7pm, i had taken the dog outside and while she sniffs around for the perfect spot to go, i always gaze up at the sky.
as soon i looked up i saw a low flying, small airplane in the sw sky. right next to the plane was another craft that did not have the same lighting as the plane. we live in airport community and we are also along the flight path of several commercial jets flying in and out of tampa. needless to say, we are very used to seeing planes of all kinds and can find at least 3 of them flying over at any given time.
the small plane was flying from n to s. this other "craft" was flying in the opposite direction and appeared to have passed the airplane at one point. all that was visible of this other object was a large yellowish-orange light that flashed on and off slowly, nowhere near as fast as faa lights on planes. this light was the only light or part of this craft that was visible.There was no noise, that we could tell. (my husband was called outside to witness this craft as well). we estimated this object as flying at a 5,000-7,000 ft altitude.
niether of us could identify what it was as it did not look at all like anything we had ever seen in the sky before. we eventually lost sight of the craft over the treeline as it flew to the north.

the second sighting took place on friday, december 3rd.
again, it was just before 7pm and i had taken the dog outside. as usual, i looked to the sky.
in the western sky at that time are two brighter stars that sit paralell to one another at approx 20- 30 degrees apart. i was looking in this direction when i noticed a third star-like light in between these two stars. i thought it looked unusual because i didn't recall ever seeing three stars in a row before.
as i watched, suddenly, the middle star faded out of existence, as though it heard my thoughts that it looked out of place. i continued to watch for several more minutes but it never reappeared.

the third sighting was last night, december 5th.
once again, just before 7pm, i took the dog out. because of the sighting i had just a few nights prior, i looked to that section of the sky. there was no third star.
my gaze went to another set of stars that appear to form a triangle with a fourth star in the middle of the bottom section but a little but higher than the two lower corners. (this star arrangement is a bit to the north and a little higher than the previous described stars from friday night.)
as i looked at this triangular star formation, i saw another star-like light appear to the left of the triangle. it flew toward the right side of the formation for a short distance before it it disappeared. like friday's sighting, this light also just went out.
i became extrememly excited knowing that i wasn't seeing something mundane. i waited and watched a few more minutes when siddenly, to the right of the triangle star formation and about 20 degrees to the north of the right most edge of it, another light (which i believe may have been the same light that had just disappeared due to this appearing along the same flight path) appeared suddenly and darted so fast to the right that it left a streak of silvery light behind it before it disappeared once again. the streak was not a contrail but the light from this object due to the speed at which it flew. the streak faded away quickly after the light disappeared. the speed of this object was unimaginable and there is no way any human could survive movement like that. this was also not a shooting star, as i have seen plenty of them and this was totally different.

after seeing this object move so fast, i took the dog inside and grabbed my nightvision scope in hopes of seeing this object again and possibly tracking it. i spent nealry 20 minutes outside scouring the sky but was not able to find this object again.

there is no way for me to estimate the altitude of the last two sightings but, from their appearance i would say they were pretty high up in the atmosphere. i was very excited after viewing each object, especially the last two.
content.summary: Three different sightings in one week

content.detailedDescription: Close to 1:45am, i was in my kitchen when a twinkling light caught my eye through the glass door. it was the southern sky, fairly low, about as bright as venus would be. my first thought was that it was just a plane or helicopter, but i realized something about the twinkling and blinking of the light was not quite like anything i'd seen before. it would twinkle brightly with a whitish light and then there would be dimmer lights (also seeming to twinkle) which seemed to have more color to them. i could not distinguish if they were the conventional red & green of a plane- just that they weren't the same bright white. i think the thing that was most odd was that the sequence of the lights seemed completely random. the bright (white) light seemed to be "on" for anywhere from 1 to 5 seconds, and "off" for a similar irregular interval. when "on," it would change quite a bit in intensity. at first, i'd had an impression the light was sort of rotating or spinning around something, but then it just seemed to random. i opened the door and took a step outside and couldn't hear any engine noise, though as bright as the light was, it seemed i should have been able to hear something- however, there was interference noise from inside the house and it was a bit breezy. it was also overcast and showery (though not raining at that moment). i could see a layer of clouds above and/or beyond the light, but the light itself was in the clear. the object moved in a smooth straight line, seemingly towards the southeast, not going up or down in elevation that i could see. it seemed to me to be somewhat slower than a plane generally would be, but i suppose that could have been an illusion. after a couple of minutes, my view became blocked by my neighbors' house (and then trees and hills). before the light caught my attention i had been happily watching "the walking dead" on tv, so i'd just like to note that this light did look so unusual to me that i felt compelled to duck out on several minutes of the season finale to investigate. that being said, i suppose my initial thoughts were probably correct, and it was either a plane or helicopter whose lights for some reason just looked very odd. i did try to look up info on identifying aircraft by their lights (particularly why the blinking would have been so random), but did not find much- at least not enough to completely convince me, so that's why i wrote this report.
content.summary: Aircraft with unusual lights or ufo

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought it was a bright star south east. after smoking my cig it started to wobbel and the colors dimmed out,then back up again. i had a full view no obstructions.After about 14 minutes a smaller light appared from the bottom and moved away toward the north to milwaukee. it traveled at a very fast rate and then went out of view. the star looking craft is still outside and has not moved except for zigzagging and changing altitude. is has went nearly dim but it seems to be waiting for the smaller light to return maybe i dont know.Just checked and my sister is watching it with me trying to get my camcorder to film it.It is bobbing up and down still and seems to be rotating colors around it. waiting for the smaller craft if it does come back.
content.summary: Appeared as a bright star then it started wobbling

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home on 1-195 east @ 21:03 i was looking across the river while riding passenger and before hitting the george washington bridge, i noticed a bright star then i noticed a cloud to the bottom right that looked peculiar due to the fact that weather.Com was reporting no clouds in the area 20 minutes prior, other stars were highly visible.  

the "cloud" must have been huge, from my point of view it was as long as my thumb and i would suspect it was several miles away.  i told my wife and she was trying to see but she was focused on driving.  it was a little rough to keep a constant view as there were a lot of street lights but between them i could clearly see that the object looked like a squished pyramid, with a very well defined bottom portion.  the upper part may have been more illuminated due to the moon/skylight and gave a very dark purple (to me it had the color of a fluffy cloud at night) but the bottom was pitch black and it looked way to well defined to be a coincidence. 

judging by the relation to the star i was keeping in view as something to base any movement on, it was stationary for at least 5 minutes.  around 21:08 we took a curve that had a lot of trees in the way and a light, the view was obstructed for no more than 10 seconds and upon the star coming back into view the object was completely gone.  i kept an eye on the area and scanned around to see where it could have "floated" if it was a cloud and it was 100% gone. 

it was a cold, crisp, clear night with great visibility.  winds wnw @ 10mph 49% humidity, dew point 15 degrees, visibility 10 miles.  i am a prior service army medic and i tried to rule out several things but i am certain this was a physical object under intelligent control due to the sudden vanishing.  something that large does not stay stationary for so long then completely vanish in less than 10 seconds.
content.summary: Appeared as a cloud, but no other clouds in sight, very symmetrical and vanished rather fast.

content.detailedDescription: There were 30 - 40 people standing at the corner of 23rd and 8th in chelsea, nyc on october 13, 2010 looking up and pointing ( they were saying they see a ufo), and news trucks from abc news 7 and ny1 were there also. the object was very big and it was high up, at least 10,000 feet and stationary. it faded in and out a few times. i was unable to get it on my video camera, so i stood around a bit then started to walk north on 8th. as i was walking i looked up ( north east ) and noticed what look like an orb shining bright blue, it disappeared and reappeared a few times. the object was flying very fast up and down side to side and circling around, it stopped once and hovered for around 3-5 seconds then took off at a hi rate of speed, it made no sound. as the orb dimmed i noticed it looked like a disc. the disc had 2 cylider shaped objects on each side, when it would move the cylinders looked like they were rotating in the direction it was going.
content.summary: There were 30 - 40 people standing at the corner of 23rd and 8th in chelsea, nyc on october 13, 2010 looking up and pointing ( they were saying they see a ufo)

content.detailedDescription: On nov 12 2010 around 11:15pm, my fiancee and i were on our way to nj and decided to take rt 13 up.  on the way she had noticed while driving across the chesapeke bridge an unusual amout of dead pelicans  on the bridge. yes pelicans. i assumed maybe they were hit by cars or something else, that was until i began to notice something very strange. all of the dead pelicans were exactly about a quarter from each other all lined up on the left side of the bridge with other birds around the body. scary thing was... the bodies were not mangled at all. almost like they just fell from the sky and were strategically placed like that. this went on for a while  but before we exited the bridge when we saw lights in the water shaped like a diamond. the colors were blue then red and then seemed to rotate and move around then dissappear. i was freaked out bc while off the bridge you still have a good visual of the water. and,the lights were still there. if anyone was in the va area that night you may remember that the sky was really clear and there was seemingly more stars out.  the connection btw the pelicans and the lights were more than a coincedence. i hope there is someone out there who can back me up. from what ive read there was numerous sightings that night.
content.summary: Lights in the water by chesapeake bridge and numerous dead birds on bridge.
